AmbulatoryPatientGroup is a kind of DiagnosisWeightedPayment

section.title: Description
section.p: "A method of classifying [medical] services. It is used as a method of determining financing to reimburse various providers for services performed." -eHealthInsurance.org

stentry.p: The amount of money that may be paid for the performance of a set of services related to the given diagnosis group.
Categorizes the medical services that may be performed in order to establish a reimbursement rate for those services. Note that this could be a DRG, and APG, or one of their derivatives.
